item.title: Heap Spray
item.description: Heap Spray using Buffer Overflow I’m new to programming in C and programming exploits. This is a documentation of my code, the assumptions I’m making along the way, and the way I tackled problems I came across. You should read this as though you’re listening to a friend talking over a cup of coffee. I don’t want people thinking I’m an expert on these things, but I do think my experiences might be valuable for others.
